StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetMarineDataBySSN]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@SSN char(9) AS
SELECT P.PERSON_ID AS MARINE_ID, ISNULL(RTRIM(P.LAST_NAME) + ', ', SPACE(0)) + ISNULL(RTRIM(P.FIRST_NAME) + SPACE(1), SPACE(0)) + ISNULL(LEFT(P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, 1), SPACE(0)) AS MARINE_NAME, P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER AS MARINE_SSN, ISNULL(RP.RANK_CODE, '') AS RANK, ISNULL(M.PRESENT_MONITORED_COMMAND_CODE, '') AS PRESENT_MCC, ISNULL(CONVERT(VARCHAR(11), M.EXPIRATION_OF_ACTIVE_SERVICE, 106), '') AS EAS, ISNULL(CONVERT(VARCHAR(11), M.EXPIRATION_OF_CURRENT_CONTRACT, 106), '') AS ECC FROM PERSON P INNER JOIN MARINE M ON P.PERSON_ID = M.MARINE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN RECRUITING_PERSON RP ON P.PERSON_ID = RP.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID WHERE P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER = @SSN
